content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] We didn't agree on a final price because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was still looking for a higher price, and as a student, I had a limited budget. We negotiated the price several times, but we couldn't reach a mutual agreement.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 7.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi
